ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name = "RFP Coordinator", NOT(ISPICKVAL(Request_Type_1__c, "Other Support Request")),OR( ISBLANK(Current_Monthly_Revenue__c ), ISBLANK(Projected_First_Revenue_Date__c ), ISBLANK(LOC__c ), ISBLANK(Summary_of_Opportunity__c ), ISBLANK(What_services_are_to_be_provided__c ), ISBLANK(What_is_the_term_of_the_opportunity__c ), ISBLANK(DSAT_Qualification__c ), ISBLANK(Compelling_Event__c ), ISBLANK(Timeline_Due_date_decision_date_other__c ), ISBLANK(Compelling_solution_or_Pricing_Exercise__c), ISBLANK(Relationship_with_Key_Decision_Maker_s__c ), ISBLANK(Decision_Criteria__c ), ISBLANK(Competitive_Analysis__c ), ISBLANK(How_can_we_differentiate_ourselves__c ), ISBLANK(What_are_obstacles_to_winning__c ), ISBLANK(Sales_Strategy__c ), ISBLANK(TEXT(Win_Probability_Score__c )), ISBLANK(TEXT(Frontier_influence_or_help_design_RFP__c ))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Request Type is NOT equal to “Other Support Request” then all the fields in the Deal Qualification and Win Strategy section must be completed.
